name: Wellons FEI Corp
tag_list: wood-boiler, wood-fired-boiler, wood-burning-boilers, wood-chip-boilers, wood-heating-systems, chaudires-au-bois
overview:
Wellons, Wellons Canada and Wellons FEI are all part of the Wellons group of companies, supplying the North American market with wood fired energy systems and dry kilns for the past 40 years. Wellons FEI supplies energy systems using a stepped grate technology with a fully automatic ash extraction system.

Capacity of the systems we build is appropriately sized for medium and large sized district heating systems such as hospitals or university campus. Applications include process and space heating using hot water, steam or thermal fluid. We also offer wood based co-generation solutions and energy production for wood drying solutions for the OSB and pellet mill industries.
